00023 Camera::Camera() {
00024     //Set up defaults
00025     eyePosition = Point3(0,0,1);
00026     lookAtPosition = Point3(0,0,0);
00027     upDirection = Point3(1,0,0);
00028 
00029     frustum[0] = -1;
00030     frustum[1] = 1;
00031     frustum[2] = -1;
00032     frustum[3] = 1;
00033     frustum[4] = 2;
00034     frustum[5] = 100;
00035 
00036     path = NULL;
00037 
00038     angleLeftFunct = angleUpFunct = NULL;
00039 }

00055 Camera::Camera(Point3 pos, Point3 lookAt, Point3 up) {
00056     eyePosition = pos;
00057     lookAtPosition = lookAt;
00058     upDirection = up;
00059 
00060     //Set up default frustum style
00061     frustum[0] = -1;
00062     frustum[1] = 1;
00063     frustum[2] = -1;
00064     frustum[3] = 1;
00065     frustum[4] = 2;
00066     frustum[5] = 100;
00067 
00068     path = NULL;
00069 
00070     angleLeftFunct = angleUpFunct = NULL;
00071 }

00140 void Camera::setFrustum(GLdouble left, GLdouble right, GLdouble bottom, GLdouble top, GLdouble zNear, GLdouble zFar) {
00141     frustum[0] = left;
00142     frustum[1] = right;
00143     frustum[2] = bottom;
00144     frustum[3] = top;
00145     frustum[4] = zNear;
00146     frustum[5] = zFar;
00147 }

00153 void Camera::update() {
00154     if (character != NULL) {
00161         character->setPosition(eyePosition, lookAtPosition);
00162     } else if (path != NULL) {
00163         eyePosition = path->getPoint();
00164     }
00165     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00166     glLoadIdentity();
00167     glFrustum(frustum[0], frustum[1], frustum[2], frustum[3], frustum[4], frustum[5]);
00168     gluLookAt(eyePosition.x, eyePosition.y, eyePosition.z, lookAtPosition.x, lookAtPosition.y, lookAtPosition.z, upDirection.x, upDirection.y, upDirection.z);
00169 
00170     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00171     glLoadIdentity();
00172 }
00173 
00174 /*******************Movement***********************
00175  * These next three functions handle a nice form of movement in which
00176  * the camera moves as though on the surface of a sphere centered at
00177  * the lookAtPosition.
00178  **************************************************/
00179 
00200 void Camera::spinRightAroundCenter(GLdouble angle) {
00201     double radius = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getMag();
00202 
00203     //Set up some basis vectors for the plane in which you want to move
00204     Point3 basisY = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getUnit();
00205     Point3 basisX = Point3::cross(basisY, upDirection).getUnit();
00206 
00207     //Rotate the basis vectors by angle, this is the vector to translate
00208     //to our final destination
00209     Point3 returnVector = basisX*cos((angle+90)*(PI/180.0)) + basisY*sin((angle+90)*(PI/180.0));
00210 
00211     //Translate to the final position
00212     eyePosition = lookAtPosition + returnVector.getUnit()*radius;
00213 }
00214 
00234 void Camera::spinUpAroundCenter(GLdouble angle) {
00235     double radius = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getMag();
00236 
00237     //Set up some basis vectors for the plane in which you want to move
00238     Point3 basisY = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getUnit();
00239     Point3 basisX = Point3::cross(basisY, upDirection).getUnit();
00240     Point3 basisZ = Point3::cross(basisX, basisY).getUnit();
00241 
00242     //Rotate the basis vectors by angle, this is the vector to translate
00243     //to our final destination
00244     Point3 returnVector = basisY*cos((angle)*(PI/180.0)) + basisZ*sin((angle)*(PI/180.0));
00245 
00246     //Adjust the upDirection
00247     upDirection = basisZ;
00248 
00249     //Translate to the final position
00250     eyePosition = lookAtPosition + returnVector.getUnit()*radius;
00251 }
00252 
00271 void Camera::spinViewAroundCenter(GLdouble angle) {
00272     //Set up some basis vectors for the plane in which you want to move
00273     Point3 basisY = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getUnit();
00274     Point3 basisX = Point3::cross(basisY, upDirection).getUnit();
00275     Point3 basisZ = Point3::cross(basisX, basisY).getUnit();
00276 
00277     //Adjust the upDirection
00278     upDirection = basisX*cos((90+angle)*(PI/180.0)) + basisZ*sin((90+angle)*(PI/180.0));
00279 }

00284 void Camera::followPath(Path<Point3> pathToFollow) {
00285     printf("Called Camera::followPath()\n");
00286     if (path != NULL) {
00287         delete path;
00288     }
00289     path = new Path<Point3>;
00290     (*path) = pathToFollow;
00291 }
00292 
00296 void Camera::unFollowPath() {
00297     if (path != NULL) {
00298         delete path;
00299     }
00300     path = NULL;
00301 }

00314 void Camera::zoomIn(GLdouble amount) {
00315     eyePosition = eyePosition * amount;
00316 }

00329 void Camera::shift(Point3 direction, GLdouble amount) {
00330     Point3 shift = direction.getUnit()*amount;
00331     eyePosition = eyePosition + shift;
00332     lookAtPosition = lookAtPosition + shift;
00333 }

00356 void Camera::unFollowCharacter() {
